  sgcool_label_text: Francois Valentijn was a minister
 naturalist and writer who devoted much of his life in serving the Dutch V.O.C.
 having spent a significant tenure from 1685 to 1714 in the East Indies. His monumental work Oud en Nieuw Oost-Indien (Old and New East-India)
 published between 1724 and 1726
 offered a comprehensive mapping of Southeast Asia
 and a large selection of scale maps and views of the East Indies.

metadata.sgcool_label_text: Francois Valentijn was a minister, naturalist and writer who devoted much of his life in serving the Dutch V.O.C., having spent a significant tenure from 1685 to 1714 in the East Indies. His monumental work Oud en Nieuw Oost-Indien (Old and New East-India), published between 1724 and 1726, offered a comprehensive mapping of Southeast Asia, and a large selection of scale maps and views of the East Indies.
